credit_line: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
dimensions: H x W: 176.7 x 77.3 cm (5 ft. 9 9/16 in. x 30 7/16 in.); includes tie
title: Dress
medium:
Medium: chaguar fiber (bromeliad family)
Technique: interconnected looping and crochet
description: Halter-style dress with a tie at the neck in tan, dark brown and dark blue. Looping is tighter in the mid-section to form a waistband. Deep flounce at the bottom. Pattern is geometric.
name: Dress
